name: Pioneer DJ Controller DDJ-400
description: 2-channel DJ controller ideal for beginners, with a professional layout inherited from high-end equipment.

name: Sennheiser HD 25 Headphones
description: Lightweight and durable professional headphones with high ambient noise attenuation, ideal for DJs.

name: DJM-250MK2 Mixer
description: 2-channel mixer with Magvel crossfader, Sound Color FX filters, and built-in USB sound card.

name: Numark Mixtrack Pro FX DJ Controller
description: 2-deck DJ controller with high-resolution jog wheels, integrated audio interface, and dedicated effects.

name: Audio-Technica ATH-M50x Headphones
description: Professional headphones with large aperture drivers, exceptional clarity, and deep bass response.

name: Behringer DJX750 Mixer
description: 4-channel mixer with built-in digital effects, VCA crossfader, and 3-band equalizers.

name: Hercules Inpulse 300 DJ Controller
description: 2-deck DJ controller with integrated light guide to learn mixing, ideal for beginners.

name: Pioneer HDJ-X5 Headphones
description: Professional DJ headphones with high-quality sound, robust design, and comfort for long sessions.

name: Allen & Heath Xone:23 Mixer
